summary.title: I love my profession!
summary.content:
I love that I'm pushed to keep on working my skills to produce better products! I love to figure out how to improve the work environment of my teams to make their job easier and their work more efficient! I love to share my experience and benefitting from the experience of others!

With that out of the way:

summary.title: Hi!
summary.content:
I'm Tobias, a passionate Software (Web) Developer and Tech Lead since over 10 years. Even though my focus has been the frontend side of web applications, especially using TypeScript and React, I always enjoyed the chance to look beyond that and be more involved in a fullstack scope.

Beyond coding, what I enjoy most, is taking ownership of the critical technical challenges and ensuring that the company vision is reflected in architecture and code, while enabling my team to work as efficiently as they can.

summary.title: My Principles
summary.content:
❶ Communicate respectfully and transperantly
❷ Have a requirements focused architectual and development process
❸ Achieve good and maintainable code, based on the architecture, automated testing and the concept of polite code (https://youtu.be/7EmboKQH8lM?t=3160)
❹ Clear the path of obstacles for the team ⟶ the team is king
❺ Share knowledge within your team and beyond

work.name: eHealth-Tec GmbH
highlights: Bulding User Interfaces with React, Next.js and TypeScript
Developing Backend for Frontends as Anti Corruption Layers with Node.js and NestJS
Achieving transparent and efficient communication between the Team and Stakeholders
Driving a Requirements based Software Architecture and Development process
work.summary: Digitalising the german health system, by improving the experience for patients, doctors and pharmacists.
projects: White-Label online Pharmacy (TypeScript, React, Next.js, NestJS, REST)
Browser based e-prescription creation for doctors (TypeScript, React, Material-UI)]

work.name: Medtower UG
highlights: Driving the architecture and development of Node.js microservices and SPA
Building realtime communication with AMQP 1.0 and Apache Qpid Message Broker
Providing the geo and map specific information in an offline environment with OpenMapTiles Server
Management of the external work of a Apache NIFI consulting company
work.summary: Medtower UG develops soft- and hardware solutions to make tasks in hospitals more transparent and productive.
projects: Medtow Radar - Using IoT to observe and control hospital devices like beds and wheelchairs
Individual ETL Solutions - Using Apache Flink, Nifi and Node.js to migrate, transform and aggregate medical data

work.name: remind me GmbH
highlights: Creating the technical concept for the white label product
Modular components with React and Flow for flexible use in different contexts
Mentoring of junior and mid-level developers
work.summary: Development of a B2C web application in an agile (Kanban) team of five developers. Refactoring and adapting the application to become a white label product for better integration in B2B. The application reminds their customers of ending contracts and offers alternatives.

work.name: Cedavis Technology GmbH
highlights: Frontend development with TypeScript, React, Redux and SCSS
Module for PDF reports from React components with Java Nashorn
Development of a web application with Angular.js 1
Simulation of the future data development
work.summary: Data Warehouse and reporting solutions for health care institutions
projects: PKMS Management - Optimise working processes in health care institutions
Live Reporting - Live reports about patients, bed and staff availability in health care institutions

education.institution: Berlin University of Applied Sciences Berlin (BHT)

certificates.name: iSAQB Certified Professional for Software Architecture - Foundation
